info.name: NodeJS BackEnd
info.description:
Todas las rutas para probar:  
**USUARIOS**

- **Login**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/users/login](http://localhost:3000/api/users/login)

Auth: None

Body:

{

email : "registered email",

password : "registered password"

}

- **Create User**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/users/](http://localhost:3000/api/users/login)

Auth: Nedded (Restriccion: tiene que ser un _**superadmin**_ para crear usuarios)

Body:

{

name : "user name",

email : "user email",

password : "user password",

rol : "user rol, este campo es opcional, rol por defecto -> regular"

}

- **Get User**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/users/](http://localhost:3000/api/users/)

Auth: Nedded

Body: None

- **Get User Info (current logged user)**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/users/profile](http://localhost:3000/api/users/profile)

Auth: Nedded

Body: None

- **Get User By ID**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/users/{id}](http://localhost:3000/api/users/{idd)

Auth: Nedded

Body: None

- **Update User**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/users/{id}](http://localhost:3000/api/users/profile)

Auth: Nedded (Restriccion: tiene que ser un _**superadmin**_ para crear usuarios)

Body:

{

name : "new name",

password: "new password",

rol : "new rol"

}

- **Delete User**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/users/{id}](http://localhost:3000/api/users/profile)

Auth: Nedded (Restriccion: tiene que ser un _**superadmin**_ para crear usuarios)

Body: None

**COMENTARIOS**

- **Create Commentary**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/comments/](http://localhost:3000/api/users/profile)

Auth: Nedded

Body:

{

content : "content of your commentary"

}

- **Get Commentary by ID**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/comments/{id}](http://localhost:3000/api/users/profile)

Auth: Nedded

Body: None

- **Get Commentary by Author**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/comments/author/{id}](http://localhost:3000/api/users/profile)

Auth: Nedded

Body: None

- **Get Commentary Replies**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/comments/replies/{id}](http://localhost:3000/api/users/profile)

Auth: Nedded

Body: None

- **Update Commentary**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/comments/{id}](http://localhost:3000/api/users/profile)

Auth: Nedded (Restriccion: El usuario logeado debe ser el autor del comentario que va a modificar)

Body:

{

content : "New content"

}

- **Delete**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/comments/{id}](http://localhost:3000/api/users/profile)

Auth: Nedded (Restriccion: El usuario logeado debe ser el autor del comentario que va a eliminar)

Body: None

**REACCIONES**

- **Create Reaction**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/reactions/](http://localhost:3000/api/users/profile)

Auth: Nedded

Body:

{

commentId : "Id del comentario a responder"

type : "Me gusta | Amor | En desacuerdo"

}

- **Get Reaction by CommentID**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/reactions/reactions/{id}](http://localhost:3000/api/users/profile)

Auth: Nedded

Body: None

- **Update Reaction**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/reactions/](http://localhost:3000/api/users/profile)update/{reactionId}

Auth: Nedded (Restriccion: el usuario logeado debe ser el autor de la reaccion a modificar)

Body:

{

commentId : "Id del comentario"

type : "Nueva reaccion. Me gusta | Amor | En desacuerdo"

}

- **Delete Reaction**
    

[http://localhost:3000/api/reactions/{commentId}/{reactionId}](http://localhost:3000/api/users/profile)

Auth: Nedded

Body: None
